title: nA taramA ninu varNimpa
sahitya:
nA taramA ninu varNimpa dhAtru janaka sukhyAta shrI rAma


anupallavi

  cEtanaina maTTuku nE nI khyAtini pogaDaga nannAlagimpu
lOkAdhAra amara paripAla abhayakara agha hara shrI rAjita pAda yugaLa
munijana bhaya shamana sadAshiva Arti bhanjana jalaja nayana


caraNam 1    bAla prAyamuna mArIcuni noka kOlanEsi munula yArti dIrcci 
kAla kAluni viltuni dhrunci kAmini sItanu peNDlADa lEdA
    caraNam 2    drOhiyaina kAkAsuruDu ati durbaluDai nI pAdamulaku 
pAhi pAhiyani (sharaNaga) kApADalEdA karuNA jaladhE
    caraNam 3    nI pada dhyAnamu sEyuvAriki niratamu shubha phalamosaga lEdA 
ApadbAndhava  sadAshivanuta nA paritApamu vEga dIrccu
